api_list.name: metadata
api_list.description: The list of all available assets

optional_parameters.name: symbol
optional_parameters.description:
Define to check the coverage for specific symbol
Example values: btc, eth

optional_parameters.name: base
optional_parameters.description:
Define to check the coverage for specific base
Example values: usd, usdt

optional_parameters.name: market_venue
optional_parameters.description:
Define to check the coverage for specific data type
Example values:  binance, ftx

optional_parameters.name: data_type
optional_parameters.description:
Define to check the coverage for specific exchange
Example values: metrics, trades
